No. 7955)} Sub: Site Visits for DRB Members reg: This is with reference to the Policy Circular No.2.2.10/2023 dated 30th October 2023 whereby DRB Members are required to mandatorily make 04 Site Visits in 12 Months Period. 2_ Keeping in view of the feedback received during the interaction with DRB Members, ROs /PDs, Contractors/Consultants held on 16.11.2024 and in consultation with NHBF, the following changes have been made: 2.1 DRB Members are now required to make 2 Physical Site Visits and 2 Video Conference (VC) in alternate in 12 Months Period. Even, in case of Site Visit also, there will be VC at Site (i.e, Total 4VCs) 2.2 The presence of the following personnel is mandatory for the Video Conference (VC): A) NHAI: Chief General Manager (Technical) , HQ (ii) Regional Officer (RO) (ii) Project Director (PD) B) Contractor/ Concessionaire: (i) Contractor / Concessionaire Representative (Project Manager) (ii) Contractor/ Concessionaire Senior Management (HQ) C) IEITL & Authorized Personnel of the Consultancy Firm HQ: 2.3 VC link to be created and shared by the Technical Division NHAI, HQ 3. In addition, DRB may also Visit the Site and/or hold VC at the written request of either Party: The timing f Site Visits/ Video Conferences shall be as agreed amongst Authority, Contractor/ Concessionaire & Board, but failing such Agreement it shall be fixed by the Board. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. fz/es (CS.
